bug.author: volcacius
bug.description:
A recently introduced feature unfortunately breaks compability with Pytorch 1.1.0.
IterableDataset support, introduced in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamFalcon/pytorch-lightning/issues/323>issue 323</denchmark-link> , requires Pytorch 1.2.0+. To Reproduce In a python environment with Pytorch 1.1.0 do: import pytorch_lightning
Compatibility with Pytorch 1.1.0. I'm filing it as a bug report rather than a docs fix since the dependency on 1.2.0+ introduced by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamFalcon/pytorch-lightning/issues/323>issue 323</denchmark-link> doesn't seem to be intentional.
